scripts.start: cross-env STAGE=test npm run migrate && sls offline start --skipCacheInvalidation
scripts.test: cross-env TZ=UTC STAGE=test npm run lint && STAGE=test npm run migrate && npm run mocha
scripts.test:watch: cross-env TZ=UTC STAGE=test npm run lint && STAGE=test npm run migrate && npm run mocha -- --watch
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env TZ=UTC STAGE=test npm run lint && STAGE=test npm run migrate && npm run coverage && npm run coverage:upload
scripts.coverage: cross-env STAGE=test nyc --reporter=text-summary --reporter=lcov --reporter=cobertura --report-dir=./coverage --reporter=html npm run mocha -- --reporter=min --exit
scripts.update:docs: npm run docs && git add README.md && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m 'Updating `docs`'

hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run update:docs
